issues.description: In the problem description the method to compute the total number of students is named in snake_case as `get_total_number_of_students()`, but the UML, template, and solution use the camelCase name `getTotalNumberOfStudents()`. This inconsistency can confuse students about the exact method signature they need to implement.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem description to use the camelCase signature `getTotalNumberOfStudents()` to match the UML and code.
